9.2.20  6:47 pm   why is it called a butterfly

      'butterfly' is short for fluttering beautiful fly

9.2.20  6:35 pm   how to find happiness

      start explaining time to someone

9.2.20  6:29 pm   do you ever feel like you're really good at playing a song but then when you record your skill level drops because you make some mistakes when playing it "really good"? (keyboard)

      actually what happens sometimes on recording is you're afraid to make mistakes. but mistakes are actually what makes things good. the entire universe was a mistake

9.2.20  6:18 pm   Are you bilingual?

      that would be convenient

9.2.20  5:26 pm   favorite object on the sky that is actually in space and looks very small to you?

      the 'featured planet' that sometimes appears next to the moon for a few days/weeks

9.2.20  5:09 pm   what are your interests

     communication

     and why

      if we can communicate together, we can be something more

9.2.20  4:33 pm   how do you stop yourself from being sent to the neather realm?

      maybe find yourself a mantra

9.2.20  4:29 pm   Why is coronavirus on planet earth?

     sort of an ice breaker, to help us all get to know each other

     Can't you send it to Saturn?

     that's not very nice

9.2.20  4:17 pm   what do you think when you hear the acronym 'cd'?

      cat/dog

9.2.20  3:34 pm   How long is the long long journey?

      average sized

9.2.20  3:24 pm   Is music a language?

      it communicates feelings more than information. but it can add feelings to information, which in turn can strengthen the performance of the information

9.2.20  3:03 pm   What is your most favorite song that you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

9.2.20  2:01 pm   What is ur favorite board game

      graph paper

9.2.20  1:56 pm   One of my friends writes music and people describe his music as very genuine (he pours his heart out in his lyrics). I'm confused about how people know what music is genuine and what's not, and how they measure what is more genuine than other music? I think if you are making the music you wanna make, that is you being genuine. Right?

     yes, but sometimes if you wear a certain brand of clothing, then your music is considered genuine

     Also thanks for everything you do, and for taking time out of your day to answer questions when you do not have to!!! You're awesome!

9.2.20  1:47 pm   What is the best way to describe your self as? 

      just show up

9.2.20  1:41 pm   what do you think about stairs inside buildings?

      they're so majestic

9.2.20  1:30 pm   What is Damien Maymdien's occupation?  Like I'm not sure what his role is.

      television host

9.2.20  1:22 pm   Do you prefer doing videos that take you long amounts of time or shorter videos?

      i hate both. why can't i do a long video in a normal amount of time

9.2.20  12:47 pm   what did the letter that you wrote to yourself say?

      i have written more than 1 letter to myself

9.2.20  12:40 pm   How do I figure out the time signature of a piano song (without looking at the sheet music)? Like, I know what it sounds like and how to play it, but I don't know what the time signature should be. Thanks Mr Bill  

      first try to find the beat. then, try to see if it's in groups of 4. if not, try to see if it's in groups of 3. then, just transcribe the whole thing without bar lines and just put the bar lines wherever you want

9.2.20  12:21 pm   hi bill. I know there's no time for you to play video games anymore but what's the last actual video game you've played? NES Super Mario Bros? What?

      e-mail

9.2.20  12:10 pm   Can you offer any good life advice?

      yes

9.2.20  11:55 am   Will you ever do an autobiography?

     yes

      I really want to know what your life was like.

9.2.20  11:42 am   I wonder if my cat is actually a dog

      it might be both, just in case

9.2.20  11:36 am   I want to write a book, but can never find the motivation to sit down and put pen to paper. Any tips?

      how about doing it on the computer

      scan it into the computer

9.2.20  11:26 am   How do I make a song for someone I like?

      it only works if the song likes them too. sometimes the song will unexpectedly be about who the song actually likes

9.2.20  10:44 am   I'm still waiting for you to come to Starbucks in New Canaan, will you ever come?

      i was already there but i will go there again i think

9.2.20  10:44 am   i am overwhelmed with the state of all things currently. how should i proceed? 

      paint some portraits

9.2.20  10:20 am   what is your favorite pickle

      regular pickle

9.2.20  9:44 am   I have to ride on a train and I really like riding on trains but I am afraid of riding on the train. What should I do?

      2 things: ride on a train and don't ride on a train. doing those at different times will be the safest way

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

      sure

      it's pretty good

      that depends how hard/soft they are

9.2.20  3:58 am   Just beat the 13th level, but the DLC just came out. What even is music theory??

      any attempt by someone (such as you) to try to make a theory about why music has the effects it does. if you think you've figured it out, you might as well start doing some press conferences because this would be huge news for planet earth in general

9.2.20  3:57 am   Why is physics the way it is?

      this is what you requested

9.2.20  3:54 am   is turkey a country or a bird

      it's both, and much more

9.2.20  3:48 am   why do you use this website opposed to maybe reddit or twitter? do you think a website that serves solely one purpose is easier? or perhaps do you just enjoy using something you created?

      what tends to happen when i try to use someone else's site, app, or platform, is i always very immediately feel that they have not offered enough design freedom. i find myself trying to delete all the style elements, and i usually reach a point where that is not allowed for some reason

      no but that sounds like something i would do

      never heard of it

      i only get flashbacks to previous sneezes
